name: Login Page Renders Correctly
description: Verify that the login page displays all required elements including logo, input fields, and buttons
steps: Navigate to the login page at /
Verify the Stock Verify logo/icon is visible
Verify the username input field is present and accessible
Verify the password input field is present and accessible
Verify the Sign In button is present
Verify the Remember Me checkbox is present
Verify the Forgot Password link is present
Verify the version number is displayed in footer
expectedResult: All login page elements are visible and properly styled with dark theme

name: Login Form Validation - Empty Fields
description: Test login form validation for empty username and password fields
steps: Verify error alert is displayed with message 'Please enter username and password'
expectedResult: Error alert is shown when submitting empty form

name: Remember Me Checkbox Toggle
description: Test the remember me checkbox toggles correctly on tap
steps: Tap on the Remember Me checkbox
expectedResult: Remember Me checkbox toggles between checked and unchecked states

name: Sign In Button Disabled State
description: Test that Sign In button is disabled when fields are empty
steps: Verify Sign In button is disabled when both fields are empty
Verify Sign In button is still disabled
Verify Sign In button becomes enabled
expectedResult: Sign In button is only enabled when both username and password are filled

name: Forgot Password Link
description: Test that Forgot Password link shows appropriate message
steps: Verify alert dialog appears with contact administrator message
expectedResult: Alert dialog shows 'Please contact your administrator to reset your password'

name: Username Input Field
description: Test username input field accepts text input
steps: Verify the text appears in the field
expectedResult: Username field accepts and displays typed text

name: Password Input Field Secure Entry
description: Test password field hides text with secure entry
steps: Verify the text is hidden (shown as dots/asterisks)
expectedResult: Password field masks the entered text

name: Login Page Animations
steps: Verify logo has subtle rotation animation

name: Security Notice Display
description: Verify security notice is shown on login page
steps: Scroll to see the security notice
Verify text 'Secured with 256-bit encryption' is displayed
expectedResult: Security notice with shield icon is visible

name: Version Footer Display
description: Verify version and copyright info in footer
